inlineContent.text: The StripePaymentSheet module is compatible with apps targeting iOS 13.0 or above.
for fine-grained documentation of all the classes and methods in the SDK.

abstract.text: PaymentSheet is a prebuilt UI that combines all the steps required to pay - collecting payment details, billing details, and confirming the payment - into a single sheet that displays on top of your app.

to convert a response from the Stripe API into an

expects the JSON response to be in the exact same format as the Stripe API.
